select ei.id, ei.material_id, ei.user_id, ei.integral, ei.create_date, ui.code, ui.images as userImages, ui.name as userName, ui.mail, ui.address, mi.name as materialName, mi.images as materialImages from exchange_info ei left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ei.user_id) left join material_info mi on (ei.material_id = mi.id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{exchangeInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{exchangeInfo.userName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{exchangeInfo.materialName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{exchangeInfo.userId}
AND ei.material_id = #{exchangeInfo.materialId}
order by ei.create_date desc
